entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 30 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
